meaning_str.bing:
n. 英里；很远的距离；一英里赛跑
adv. 表示强调
网络. 哩；英哩；迈

英里；很远的距离；一英里赛跑

英里（长度单位）；一英里赛跑；海里（等于1852米）；里程标；<口>很大的程度；一英里长的跑道；（miles）一大段路程；很长的距离；大面积
非常；极其；大大地；远远地；在很大程度上；<口>以很大距离

1.en: A quarter of a mile up in the sky someone was dancing.
1.cn: 在四分之一英里高的上空，有人在跳舞。

2.en: When the bullet struck just a few inches above his head, i couldn't help saying to myself: a miss is as good as a mile.
2.cn: 子弹打在离他的头只有几英寸的上方，我不禁叹道：死里逃生总是生。

3.en: Considering that nobody was so high within a ten-mile radius, she did not take any notice to the light openings any more.
3.cn: 略微想了一下，方圆十里没有这样的“高材生”，于是便不去管那缝隙了。

0.en: We can't start a hack on them until they're within a two mile range.
0.cn: 他们要在两英里范围之内我们才能开始攻击他们的系统。

1.en: What makes it so, "super"? 242 mile per hour, top speed. And, it's bulletproof.
1.cn: 超跑是怎么个“超”法儿？最高时速达到242英里每小时，而且还是防弹的。

2.en: Sheer drops on every side, a motorcade from hell protected by a small army from one mile on either direction? Yeah, that's about it.
2.cn: 两面都是悬崖，这该死的车队前后一英里各有一小支武装部队保护着。嗯，差不多是这样。

3.en: This 10-mile recreational park is lined with bike paths and beaches, and is proof that busy Singaporeans do know how to kick back and relax.
3.cn: 这个面积 10 英里的休憩公园布满了单车径和海滩，也证明了新加坡人不止忙碌工作，也懂得放松享受。

4.en: Starting at 1:00 p.m., we'll be assigning every volunteer to a search team. Each team is in charge of a single section of the critical 12-square-mile radius.
4.cn: 从下午一点开始，我们把志愿者分成若干小组。每个小组负责一块区域在方圆十二平方英里内展开搜索。

5.en: On September 4, 1882, visionary inventor Thomas Edison switched on America's first central power plant, delivering electricity to 400 electric bulbs in less than one square mile of the city.
5.cn: 1882年9月4日，发明家托马斯·爱迪生，启动了美国第一个发电站，给400个电灯供电，供电面积不到1平方英里。

6.en: We lived about a quarter mile off Route 17, about a half-mile from the town of Greenbow, Alabama. That's in the county of Greenbow.
6.cn: 我们住在17号公路附近，距离亚拉巴马州绿茵镇约半里，这个地方属于绿茵县。

7.en: Oh. How'd he do? Well, picture the Hindenburg meets Chernobyl meets Three Mile Island meets Tron 2.
7.cn: 他表现如何啊？想象一下"兴登堡"号飞艇爆炸加上切尔诺贝利核泄漏加上三里岛核泄漏再加上《电子世界争霸战2》。

8.en: This thirteen thousands mile barrier was built by Chinese hands to protect the people from invading armies.
8.cn: 两个两万公里长的屏障，是华夏人民亲手而建，以御外敌。

9.en: Well, so how does it work? Well, it shows me all the single women in a five-mile radius who are using the app.
9.cn: 这软件怎么用？上面会显示出方圆八公里内所有使用这软件的单身女子。

10.en: The driver's been unreachable since his shift began. There's enough radiation on that truck to impact a 30-mile radius.
10.cn: 自从他的轮班开始，司机就失联了。卡车上的放射物足够影响方圆50公里左右的区域。

11.en: From the futuristic Grande Arche at La Defense, the six mile-long Historic Axis of Paris leads us back into France's grand past.
11.cn: 从极具未来感的新凯旋门出发，跟着 9.66 公里长的「巴黎历史轴线」重回法国过去的辉煌年代。

12.en: Rising over half a mile into the sky is the breathtaking centerpiece of Dubai, The Burj Kalifa, the tallest structure ever built.
12.cn: 高耸入云的哈利法塔是迪拜的惊人地标，超过八百米的尖塔，是目前全球最高的建筑物。

13.en: And I'll be damned if I see how you got within a mile of her unless you brought the groceries to the back door. But all the rest of that is a goddamn lie.
13.cn: 我也想不通你是怎么接近她的，除非你是杂货店送货的，至于你其它的话都是扯淡。

14.en: But, Nana, it still is. Yeah, right. Ow! I can recall the ushers in their velvet suits. Queues a mile long just to get a ticket. The curtain rising over that glorious stage.
14.cn: 奶奶，魔力还在。在才怪。嗷！我还记得引座员都穿着丝绒的制服，排队的人绵延不绝，只求一票在手，大幕在灯火辉煌的舞台上徐徐升起。

15.en: I did it. One mile on a hippity-hop. That's it. That's everything I wanted to do before I was thirty. Oh, except I wanted to patch things up with my sister. But oh well. Yay.
15.cn: 我成功了！ 我在跳跳球上走了1哩，这是30岁前我想完成的全部的事，除了我想和我妹修好关系。嗯，可是，耶。

16.en: Travelling the eight hundred mile trip from Shanghai to Beijing used to take fourteen hours, now you can get there in just over five hours at speeds upwards of 180 miles per hour.
16.cn: 从上海到北京有一千两百多公里。过去需要十四个小时，现在你只需要五个多小时就能抵达，时速已达到两百九十公里。
